Title: Jump In!
Writer: Doreen Spicer, Regina Y. Hicks, Karin Gist
Actors: Corbin Bleu, Keke Palmer, David Reivers, Shanica Knowles
Plot: Story revolves around a young boxer, Izzy Daniels, who trains to follow in his father's footsteps by winning the Golden Glove. When his friend, Mary, however, asks him to substitute for a team member in a Double Dutch tournament, the young man discovers a hidden passion for jump roping
